00016 // Name: class CWaveFile
00017 // Desc: Encapsulates reading or writing sound data to or from a wave file
00018 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 class CWaveFile
00020 {
00021 public:
00022     WAVEFORMATEX* m_pwfx;        // Pointer to WAVEFORMATEX structure
00023     HMMIO m_hmmio;       // MM I/O handle for the WAVE
00024     MMCKINFO m_ck;          // Multimedia RIFF chunk
00025     MMCKINFO m_ckRiff;      // Use in opening a WAVE file
00026     DWORD m_dwSize;      // The size of the wave file

00029     BOOL m_bIsReadingFromMemory;
00030     BYTE* m_pbData;
00031     BYTE* m_pbDataCur;
00032     ULONG m_ulDataSize;
00033     CHAR* m_pResourceBuffer;
00034 
00035 protected:
00036     HRESULT ReadMMIO();
00037     HRESULT WriteMMIO( WAVEFORMATEX* pwfxDest );
00038 
00039 public:
00040             CWaveFile();
00041             ~CWaveFile();
00042 
00043     HRESULT Open( LPWSTR strFileName, WAVEFORMATEX* pwfx, DWORD dwFlags );
00044     HRESULT OpenFromMemory( BYTE* pbData, ULONG ulDataSize, WAVEFORMATEX* pwfx, DWORD dwFlags );
00045     HRESULT Close();
00046 
00047     HRESULT Read( BYTE* pBuffer, DWORD dwSizeToRead, DWORD* pdwSizeRead );
00048     HRESULT Write( UINT nSizeToWrite, BYTE* pbData, UINT* pnSizeWrote );
00049 
00050     DWORD   GetSize();
00051     HRESULT ResetFile();
00052     WAVEFORMATEX* GetFormat()
00053     {
00054         return m_pwfx;
00055     };
